snippet: Michele Bachmann makes her last campaign stop about repealing President Obama's health care law.
abstract: Michele Bachmann makes her last campaign stop about repealing President Obama's health care law.
lead_paragraph: WEST DES MOINES, Iowa -- Representative Michele Bachmann made her longstanding pledge to repeal President Obama's health care law the central focus of her last campaign stop in the Des Moines area before tonight's caucuses.

headline.main: Bachmann Looks to an Election Night 'Miracle'
